resources.string: Read free bedtime stories, fairytales \n and other stories

Kidstories is a platform where you can access an ever expanding library of stories that celebrates the uniqueness of a child\'s mind. Covering a wide range of ages, our stories are age and genre grouped, making it easy for you to browse through. It also offers you an opportunity to explore your creative writing abilities, by uploading your very own story.
Developed by KidStories Mobile track HNGi6 2019.
Get notified to read your child a story
You have not submitted any story
